title: What isAmazon DynamoDB?

metadata.description: Learn about What isAmazon DynamoDB? with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Amazon DynamoDB is a database service with both document and key-value data structure support.
Amazon DynamoDB Introduction Video
.com is collaborating with Amazon Web Services to deliver digital training content to our students
What is Amazon DynamoDB?
Amazon DynamoDB is an affordable cloud based serverless database service.
Management of an Amazon DynamoDB database is automated.
Amazon DynamoDB databases
DynamoDB stores data tables, items and attributes
Items are unique in the tables
Amazon DynamoDB Pricing
Amazon DynamoDB is pay as you go or by provisioned capacity.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers What isAmazon DynamoDB? concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use What isAmazon DynamoDB? effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of What isAmazon DynamoDB? and how to apply it in your projects.
